name: 施陽正
objective: 本課程主要是教導學生在熱流學領域上的基本知識，課程內容主要包括: 1. 熱力特性簡介， 2. 熱力學基本定律， 3. 基本冷凍空調循環， 4. 流體特性簡介， 5. 柏努利方程式， 6. 管內與管外流， 7. 穩態與暫態熱傳分析， 8. 散熱片之熱傳分析， 9. 強制對流分析， 10. 自然對流分析， 11. 具相變化的熱對流: 凝結與沸騰。
schedule:
1                         Course outline & Thermodynamics, (1): Fundamentals
2                         Thermodynamics, (2): 1st law-Closed system
3                         Thermodynamics, (3): 1st law-SSSF
4                         Thermodynamics, (4): 1st law-USUF
5                         Thermodynamics, (5): 2nd law-Closed System
6                         Thermodynamics, (6): 2nd law-Control Volume
7                         Fluid Mechanics (1): Fundamentals & Fluid Statics
8                         Fluid Mechanics (2): Bernoulli Equation
9                         Fluid Mechanics (3): Reynolds Transport Theorem (RTT)
10                       Mid-term Exam
11                       Fluid Mechanics (4): Fluid Kinematics
12                       Fluid Mechanics (5): Navier-Stokes Equation
13                       Fluid Mechanics (6): Drag and Lift
14                       Heat Transfer (1): Fundamentals & Energy Conservation
15                       Heat Transfer (2): Conduction
15                       Heat Transfer (3): Convection-External Flow
16                       Heat Transfer (4): Convection-Internal Flow
17                       Heat Transfer (5): Natural Convection
18                       Final Exam
scorePolicy: 作業及出席率: 20%, 期中考:40%，期末考:40%
materials:
教科書:  M. J. Moran, H. N. Sharpiro, B. R. Munson, D. P. Dewitt, 
               "Introduction to   Thermal System Engineering: Thermodynamics, 
               Fluid Mechanics, and Heat Transfer", 2003. John Wiley & Sons, Inc.
參考書: 1. Cengel, Y.A., and M.A. Boles. 2015. “Thermodynamics :
                  an engineering approach,”Eight edition.
              2. Donald F. Young, Bruce Munson, Theodore H. Okiishi, 
                  Wade W. Huebsch: "Introduction to Fluid Mechanics", 5th ed., 2012.
              3. Y.A. Cengel, "Heat and Mass Transfer: Fundamentals and Applications", 
                 2011 4/e
